metadata.dc:author: Bartual, J
Oliva, M
García Teno, M A
Martín García, M A
metadata.dc:description: The theoretical basis for bithermal caloric test assessment by means of caloric surfaces is described. This system supports a computer program for the automatic appraisal of the test, as a first step in the development of our intelligent system for vestibular diagnosis.
metadata.dc:title: La superficie calórica en la valoración de la prueba calórica bitérmica: hacia un sistema inteligente de diagnóstico vestibular.
[Caloric surface and assessment of the caloric bithermal test. Toward an intelligent system of vestibular diagnosis].
